articles.author: Eric Berger
articles.title: Trump official to Katy Perry and Bezos’ fiancée: “You cannot identify as an astronaut” - Ars Technica
articles.description: It turns out the FAA now takes no role in identifying who is an astronaut.

articles.author: Nicoletta Lanese
articles.title: 'Olo' is a brand-new color only ever seen by 5 people - Live Science
articles.description: Using an experimental technique called "Oz," researchers stimulated the human retina such that people saw a brand-new color.
articles.content:
Scientists have devised a method to hijack the human eye, enabling it to see brand-new colors that lie beyond the scope of natural human vision.
With this technique, the researchers enabled five peo… [+7510 chars]

articles.author: Jacek Krywko
articles.title: Rover finds hints of an ancient Martian carbon cycle - Ars Technica
articles.description: Rather than cycling, some of Mars’ carbon took a one-way trip into rocks.
